description: Number of winning (or reformed) decks at Mousetrap.
references: A. M. Bersani, "Reformed permutations in Mousetrap and its generalizations," Preprint Me.Mo.Mat. n. 15/2005.
R. K. Guy, Unsolved Problems Number Theory, E37.
R. K. Guy and R. J. Nowakowski, "Mousetrap," in D. Miklos, V. T. Sos and T. Szonyi, eds., Combinatorics, Paul Erd≈ës is Eighty. Bolyai Society Math. Studies, Vol. 1, pp. 193-206, 1993.
R. K. Guy and R. J. Nowakowski, "Mousetrap," Amer. Math. Monthly, 101 (1994), 1007-1010.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
links: A. M. Bersani, On the game Mousetrap.
